title: Strengthening Teaching Methodology Practical Skills: Orchestrating Multi-Spatial Learning Environments with Augmented Reality

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can independently perform context-specific language tasks using AR technology in multi-spatial (physical/virtual) environments at least 80% of the time
Learners can generate personalized language learning scenarios using automated instructional design tools at least three times
Learners integrate and apply at least four language competencies required in real-world job contexts through project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
